ygData.subject: How to build the HyperNEAT to a lib file used in C++?
ygData.msgSnippet: hello everyone. I wanna test hyperneat in evolving locomotion for modular robots. The OS is Win7 and IDE is VS2010. How to build the HyperNEAT? or how to embed
